content: lips kiss heel recipe sts before second marker kfb k 1 sl i recommend that you use this heel *k2 p1* repeat until cuff measures marker too 1½ inches or desired length row 2 - k all sts sl markers as you however if you do not wish to use bind off using a stretchy cast off the come to them that heel you can use a general pictured sock used jeny s surprising short row heel for a similar effect stretchy bind off now you have a toe an after-thought heel will also work with this pattern pattern repeat charted pattern repeat written smaller size 66 stitches row 1 - *k2 p1 sl2yf p1* to last 3 sts k2 p1 row 2 & alt row - *k2 p1* to end row 3 & 5 - as for row 1 row 7 - *sl2yf p1 k2 p1* to last 3 sts sl2yf p1 row 9 & 11 - as for row 7 larger size 72 stitches row 1 - *k2 p1 sl2yf p1* to end row 2 & alt row - *k2 p1* to end row 3 & 5 - as for row 1 row 7 - *sl2yf p1 k2 p1* to end row 9 & 11 - as for row 7
